name: Cleanup Celestial, Ramiel "Яeverse"
effect:
[AUTO](VC):At the beginning of your battle phase, [Counter-Charge 1]. Then, lock all of your rear-guards with different card names from the face up cards in your damage zone. Then, for every two of your rear-guards, choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, retire it, and this unit gets [Power] +20000 until end of turn.
[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, [COST][Soul-Blast 1 grade 3 card], and this unit gets drive +1 until end of that battle. Your opponent may [Counter-Blast 2]. If they did not [Counter-Blast 2], until end of that battle, when your opponent would call cards from their hand to (GC), they must call the same number of cards as the number of cards in your damage zone or more at the same time.
productName: [VGE-D-VS04] V Special Series 04: V Clan Collection Vol.4
